name: eggplant-runner
description: Eggplant DAI Runner enable integration of DAI test configuration execution in pipeline
author: Eggplant

inputs.name: serverURL
inputs.label: DAI Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the DAI server, e.g. http://localhost:8000

inputs.name: testConfigID
inputs.label: Test Config Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the test config that you want to run, e.g. 09c48b7d-fc5b-481d-af80-fcffad5d9587

inputs.name: clientID
inputs.label: Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The client ID to use to authenticate with the DAI server [default: client:dai:agent:integration]

inputs.name: clientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The client secret to use to authenticate with the DAI server [env var: DAI_CLIENT_SECRET; required]

inputs.name: CACertPath
inputs.label: CA Cert Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to an alternative Certificate Authority pem file

inputs.name: pollInterval
inputs.label: Poll Interval
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of seconds to wait between each call to the DAI server [default: 5]

inputs.name: requestTimeout
inputs.label: Request Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The timeout in seconds for each HTTP request to the DAI server [default: 30]

inputs.name: requestRetries
inputs.label: Request Retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of times to attempt each HTTP request to the DAI server [default: 5]

inputs.name: backoffFactor
inputs.label: Backoff Factor
inputs.helpMarkDown: The exponential backoff factor between each HTTP request [default: 0.5]

inputs.name: testResultPath
inputs.label: Test Result Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to store the junit test results file generated by the execution

inputs.name: eggplantRunnerPath
inputs.label: Eggplant Runner Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to eggplant runner executable
